text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
2151 Highland Avenue
Birmingham 5, Alabama
August 27, 1962
Mr. William G. Harley
President, NAEB
Dupont Circle Office Building
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington 6, D.C,
Dear Bills
The attached copies of letters to Jim Day and John
Schwarzwalder are efforts toward maintaining morale.
I will let you know what response I get, if any.
RDH/lt
enc.
